data.comment: The match has started.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 2, Kevin for Botafogo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Botafogo's Pedro Raul gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 4, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Gremio a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Botafogo.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
In the minute 8, Gremio's Alisson is on target but unsuccessful.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Gremio's Alisson breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Arena do Gremio.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Botafogo's area.
In the minute 12, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 17, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Porto Alegre Gremio attack through Victor Ferraz. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Botafogo throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 25, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Botafogo throw-in in Gremio's half.
Carlos Renteria of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 26, Gremio have a goal kick.
Free kick Gremio.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Gremio.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 30, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Guilherme Santos (Botafogo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gremio's Matheus Henrique has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Kanu is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Diego Souza scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Alisson.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Botafogo.
Kanu returns to the field for Botafogo after picking up a slight injury.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Gremio's Alisson breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
In the minute 39, In Porto Alegre Gremio attack through Robinho. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 42, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Matheus Babi.
Great play from Pedro Raul to set up the goal.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
In the minute 45, At Arena do Gremio the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Gremio.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Gremio throw-in in Botafogo's half.
The away team have replaced Carlos Renteria with Keisuke Honda. This is the first substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
In the minute 48, Pepe is on target to give Gremio a 2-1 advantage.
Diego Souza instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Botafogo.
In the minute 53, Diego Souza (Gremio) has been sent off!
Maicon for Gremio has been booked by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Pedro Raul's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Gremio have a goal kick.
Isaque is replacing Robinho for the home team.
In the minute 58, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a second substitution, with Cicero replacing Guilherme Santos.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Victor Luis, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo are coming forward and Rhuan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Botafogo's Victor Luis looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Rhuan for Botafogo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Botafogo.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Rhuan has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 65, Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
Gremio take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Pepe.
Victor Ferraz with an assist there.
In the minute 68, Rhuan for Botafogo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 69, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Alexander Lecaros is replacing Caio Alexandre for Botafogo at Arena do Gremio.
Rhuan, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Salomon Kalou is the substitute for Botafogo.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Vanderlei is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Gremioâ€™s Vanderlei is on his feet again at Arena do Gremio.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira blows against Gremio's Alisson for offside.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
In the minute 76, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo's Salomon Kalou gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Renato Gaucho is making the team's second substitution at Arena do Gremio with Lucas Silva replacing Maicon.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 80, Matheus Babi (Botafogo) has received a yellow card from Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Rodrigues (Gremio) has received a first yellow card.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 84, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Gremio a goal kick.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Porto Alegre.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Botafogo make their fifth substitution with Kelvin replacing Sousa.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Pepe with Bruno Cortes. This is the third substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Gremio.
Botafogo needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Porto Alegre.
Botafogo have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
Botafogo's Keisuke Honda misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Botafogo throw-in in Gremio's half.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Keisuke Honda of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Gremio's Alisson breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Botafogo a goal kick.
That's full-time at Arena do Gremio. The final score is 3-1.
